Title: Clarifies that military members are authorized to possess large capacity feeding devices and other banned weapons when acting in their official military capacity
Summary: Clarifies that military members are authorized to possess large capacity feeding devices and other banned weapons when acting in their official military capacity.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 1 of the laws of 2013 amending the criminal procedure law and other laws relating to suspension and revocation of firearm licenses, in relation to the possession of certain firearms and equipment by members of the military
